LanguageData.PRT_JointOperations.EnableSoldatsWithRpg: Allow enemy soldier-type mechs to use Rapid RPG (requires restart)
LanguageData.PRT_JointOperations.RestartRequired: Settings changed: restart the game to apply.
LanguageData.PRT_JointOperations.ArtilleryDebugLog.Ti: When enabled, detailed debug logs will be printed (for verifying whether the feature is working and tracking error sources).
LanguageData.PRT_JointOperations.ArtilleryErrorMultip: Simulates informatized artillery precision in CE: scales CE indirect fire error by this multiplier (0 = perfect hit, 1 = CE vanilla)\nOnly applies to artillery mechs from this mod.
